'''''Tidal Guide (III)''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Fontaine: Dance of the Dew-White Springs (III)]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must follow 9 [[Seelie]] in the [[Morte Region]] and [[Erinnyes Forest]] to their Seelie Courts.
